heading: Ngingakwazi ukunwebeka ngaphandle kwesibeletho?

I-Cervical Mucus iyi-fluid ekhiqizwa ngumlomo wesibeletho osiza isidoda ukuhamba ngohlelo lokuzala lwabesifazane ukuze kufakwe iqanda. Ngaphandle komucu wesibeletho, kunzima ngesidoda ukusinda futhi sifinyelele iqanda, kwenze kube yinselele ukukhulelwa.

yini i-m wesiketi mlomo wesibeletho? I-MCervical Mucus iyi-fluid ecacile noma emhlophe ekhiqizwa ngumlomo wesibeletho kulo lonke umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ukuthungwa kwayo kanye nokuguquguquka okuguqukayo kuye ngokuthi umuntu wesifazane umjikelezo wakhe. Nge-ovulation, umusi wesibeletho uba mncane, oshelelayo, futhi ulule, ufana nokuthungwa kwabamhlophe beqanda abaluhlaza. Lolu hlobo lwe-mucus luyaziwa nange-mucus evundile ye-cervical ngoba isiza isidoda ukuhamba ngohlelo lokuzala ukuze sivuse iqanda.

Ungakwazi ukuvelela ngaphandle kwesibeletho? Yize i-marvical mucus iyingxenye ebalulekile yenqubo yokuzala, kusenokwenzeka ukuvelela ngaphandle kwawo. Abanye besifazane bangathola ukungalingani noma imibandela ethinta ukukhiqizwa komlomo wesibeletho, okuholela ekuntuthulweni komhla wesibeletho ovundile. Ungayilandelela Kanjani I-Ovulation ngaphandle Kwe-Mervical Mucus Uma uzama ukukhulelwa futhi ungakhiqizi mucus wesibeletho, kunezinye izindlela zokulandela i-ovulation. heading: Yiziphi izimbangela zobuhlungu be-ovulation?
body:
izimbangela ze-ovulation pain Ubuhlungu be-ovulation, owaziwa nangokuthi iMitterSchmerz, isimo esivamile esitholakale ngabesifazane abaningi ngesikhathi sokuzala. Kuboniswa ngobuhlungu obumnene kuya kolunye uhlangothi lwesisu esingezansi, okuvame ukwenzeka ngesikhathi se-ovulation. Ngenkathi izinhlungu ze-ovulation ngokuvamile azisona imbangela yokukhathazeka, kungacindezela abanye besifazane. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola izimbangela zobuhlungu be-ovulation, kufaka phakathi:
  • Ukukhishwa kweqanda
  • ama-cysts we-ovarian
  • endometriosis

    Ukukhishwa kweqanda Ubuhlungu be-ovulation bungenzeka lapho i-follicle, equkethe iqanda, i-bappere futhi idedele iqanda kwi-Fallopian Tube. Le nqubo ingadala izinhlungu ezimnene zibe nobuhlungu obuncane ohlangothini olulodwa lwesisu esingezansi, okuvame ukuhlala amahora ambalwa kuye kwezinsuku ezimbalwa. Ubuhlungu bungahambisana nezinye izimpawu, njengokuqhakaza, isicanucanu, kanye nesisa sebele.
    Ngenkathi izinhlungu ze-ovulation ziyingxenye evamile yomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kwabesifazane abaningi, kungaqina kakhulu kwezinye izimo. Lokhu kungahle kube ngenxa yokungalingani kwe-hormonal noma ezinye izimo ezingaphansi, njengama-cysts we-ovari noma endometriosis.

    Ama-cysts we-ovarian Ama-ovarian cysts agcwele uketshezi agcwele ama-ovari. Zivamile kwabesifazane beminyaka yokuzala futhi imvamisa abadali noma yiziphi izimpawu. Kodwa-ke, kwezinye izikhathi, ama-systs ama-ovarian angadala ubuhlungu be-ovulation. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi ama-cysts angaphazamisa inqubo ejwayelekile ye-ovulation, okwenza ukuthi i-follicle ibe yinzuzo futhi ibe buhlungu.
    Amanye ama-cysts ama-ovarian nawo angaqhuma, adale ubuhlungu obungazelelwe nobukhulu ohlangothini olulodwa lwesisu esingezansi. Lokhu kungaba yisimo esiphuthumayo sezokwelapha futhi kudinga ukunakekelwa kwezokwelashwa okusheshayo.

    endometriosis I-Endometriosis yisimo lapho izicubu ezivame ukulinganisa ingaphakathi zesibeletho zikhula ngaphandle kwalo. Lokhu kungadala izinhlobo zezimpawu, kufaka phakathi izinhlungu ze-pelvic, izikhathi ezibuhlungu, kanye nokuzala. I-Endometriosis nayo ingadala ubuhlungu be-ovulation, njengoba izicubu ezingaphandle kwesibeletho zingavutha futhi zibuhlungu ngesikhathi sokubopha.
    Abesifazane abane-endometriosis bangathola nobuhlungu ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini, ukunyakaza kwamathumbu, noma ukuchama. Uma usola ukuthi kungenzeka ube ne-endometriosis, kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuxilongwa okunembile nohlelo lokwelashwa.

    Izifo Zokuvuvukala Kwe-Pelvic Isifo sokuvuvukala kwe-pelvic (i-PID) ukutheleleka ngamagciwane ezitho zokuzala. Kungadala izimpawu ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi umkhuhlane, ubuhlungu be-pelvic, nokukhululwa kwangasese. I-PID ingadala nobuhlungu be-ovulation, njengoba ukutheleleka kungaphazamisa inqubo ejwayelekile ye-ovulation.
    I-PID engalashwa ingaholela ezinkingeni ezinkulu, njengokufika kokuzala kanye nobuhlungu obungapheli be-pelvic. Uma usola ukuthi kungenzeka ube nepid, kubalulekile ukufuna ukwelashwa ngokushesha okukhulu.

    Isiphetho Ubuhlungu be-ovulation buyisimo esivamile esithinta abesifazane abaningi ngesikhathi sokuzala. Ngenkathi ngokuvamile akuyona imbangela yokukhathazeka, kungacindezela abanye besifazane. Izimbangela zobuhlungu be-ovulation zingahlukahluka kungahlukahluka, kusukela ekukhululweni kweqanda kuya ezimeni eziyisisekelo njengama-cysts we-evometriosis, ne-pelvic ukuvuvukala kokuvuvukala kwezifo. Uma uhlangabezana nobuhlungu be-ovulation obukhulu noma buhlala isikhathi esingaphezu kwezinsuku ezimbalwa, kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuxilongwa okunembile nohlelo lokwelashwa. heading: Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kuyithinta kanjani i-ovulation?
body:
Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kuyithinta kanjani i-ovulation? Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kuyindlela edumile yokuvimbela ukukhulelwa okungahlosiwe. Kunezindlela eziningi zokulawulwa kokuzalwa ezitholakalayo, kufaka phakathi izinketho ze-hormonal kanye nezingezona ze-hormonal. Enye yezindlela ezisetshenziswa yimisebenzi yokuzala ngokuthinta i-ovulation, inqubo lapho iqanda ikhishwa khona kwi-ovary futhi ihambisa i-fallopian tube. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuthi ukulawula okuzala kanjani kuthinta i-ovulation, kanye nemiphumela yalokhu impilo yabesifazane.

yini i-ovulation? I-ovulation iyinqubo yemvelo eyenzeka kwabesifazane ngesikhathi sabo sokuzala. Kuyinqubo lapho iqanda ekhishwa khona kwi-ovary futhi idlula phansi i-fallopian tube, lapho ingavundiswa khona ngesidoda. I-ovulation ilawulwa ama-hormone, kufaka phakathi i-hormone evuselelayo ye-follicle (FSH) kanye nokuvuselela ama-hormone (LH), akhiqizwa yi-pituitary gland ebuchosheni.

Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kuyithinta kanjani i-ovulation? Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kusebenza ngokuguqula ibhalansi ye-hormonal emzimbeni wowesifazane. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal, njengephilisi, i-Patch, Ring, noma umjovo, kuqukethe izinhlobo zokwenziwa kwama-hormone esrogen kanye nephrotsheni, okuvimbela i-ovulation ngokucindezela ukukhishwa kwe-FSH nase-LH. Ngaphandle kwalawa ama-hormone, isibeletho asidedeli iqanda, okwenza kube nzima ukuzala nokukhulelwa kuye kwenzeka.
Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa okungewona ama-hormonal, njengePostper ioud, akuthinti i-ovulation. Esikhundleni salokho, isebenza ngokwakha indawo enobutha isidoda, okwenza kube nzima ngabo ukuhambisa nokusinda kumashubhu e-Uterus nase-Fallopian. Iphinde ibe thuthuka umucu wesibeletho, okwenza kube nzima ngokwengeziwe isidoda ukungena esibelethweni futhi kufinyelele iqanda.

Yini imiphumela yokulawula ukuzala ku-ovulation? Imiphumela yokulawulwa kokuzalwa ku-ovulation incike kuhlobo lokulawula ukuzalwa olusetshenzisiwe. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal kungavimbela i-ovulation ngokuphelele, noma kunganciphisa imvamisa ye-ovulation, okwenza kube mancane amathuba okuzala nokukhulelwa kuye kwenzeka. Kungaleso sizathu sokulawula ukuzalwa kweHormonal kuvame ukusetshenziswa njengendlela yokuqamba ukukhulelwa okungahlosiwe.
Kodwa-ke, ukucindezela i-ovulation kungaba nemiphumela yempilo yabesifazane. Isibonelo, i-ovulation iyadingeka ukuze kukhiqizwe i-progesterone, i-hormone edlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu ekugcineni impilo yesibeletho futhi ivikele ukuthuthukiswa komdlavuza othile. Lapho i-ovulation icindezelwe, umzimba awukhiqizi progesterone, okungakhulisa ubungozi bomdlavuza we-endometrial nezinye izinkinga zempilo.
Ngokwengeziwe, ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal kungaba nemiphumela emibi, njengokuthola isisindo, izinguquko zemizwa, kanye nobuhlungu bekhanda. Ingakhulisa nengozi yokuhlaziywa kwegazi, unhlangothi, nokuhlaselwa yinhliziyo kwabanye besifazane.

Isiphetho Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kuyindlela ephumelelayo yokuvimbela ukukhulelwa okungahlosiwe, futhi kusebenza ngokuthinta i-ovulation. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal kucindezela i-ovulation ngokushintsha ibhalansi ye-hormonal emzimbeni, kuyilapho ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kwama-hormonal kusebenza ngokwakha indawo enobutha isidoda. Ngenkathi ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kungaba nezinzuzo eziningi, kufaka phakathi nokuvimbela ukukhulelwa okungahlosiwe futhi kunciphise izimpawu zezimo ezithile, kubalulekile ukukala izingozi ezingaba khona nemiphumela emibi ngaphambi kokuqala noma yiluphi uhlobo lokulawula ukuzala. Abesifazane kufanele babonisane nomhlinzeki wabo wezempilo ukuthola indlela engcono kakhulu yokulawula ukuzalwa kwezidingo zabo kanye nokukhathazeka ngempilo.

heading: Ungavivinya kanjani inzalo kwabesifazane?
body:
Ungavivinya kanjani inzalo kwabesifazane? - Ukuqonda izindlela zokuhlola ukuzala kwabesifazane Ukuhlolwa kokuqina kwabesifazane kungasiza ekuhloleni impilo yowesifazane yokuzala futhi kunqume amandla akhe okukhulelwa. Kunezivivinyo eziningana ezahlukahlukene ezitholakalayo zokuhlola ukuzala, futhi ukukhetha kokuhlolwa kuzoncika ezicini ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi iminyaka yowesifazane, umlando wezokwelapha nezimpawu. Kulesi sihloko, sizoxoxa ngezindlela ezahlukahlukene zokuhlola ukuzala kwabesifazane nakulokho abakuhlosile.

1. Ukuhlola i-Ovulation Ukuhlolwa kwe-ovulation kuyindlela elula futhi engahlaseli yokuhlola ukuzala. Kubandakanya ukulandelela izinguquko kumazinga we-hormone ukunquma lapho i-ovulation kungenzeka yenzeke. Kunezinhlobo eziningi zokuhlolwa kwe-ovulation ezitholakalayo, kufaka phakathi:
  • Ukuhlolwa kwe-ovulation ye-urinary Ukuhlolwa kulula ukuyisebenzisa futhi kungenziwa ekhaya.
  • Basel umzimba lokushisa (i-BBT) ishadi: lokhu kufaka ukuthatha amazinga okushisa akho njalo ekuseni ngaphambi kokuphuma embhedeni ukuthola ukwenyuka okuncane okwenzeka ngemuva kwe-ovulation. Le ndlela idinga ukubekezela nokungaguquguquki kepha inganikeza imininingwane ebalulekile ngomjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini kanye ne-ovulation. I-
  • Ukuqapha ama-mucus wesibeletho: Izinguquko ku-marvical mucis zingakhombisa lapho i-ovulation isizokwenzeka. Ukuvuka kwesibeletho esivundile kucacile, kuyalula, futhi kufana nama-whites amaqanda. Le ndlela idinga ukubhekwa ngokucophelela kwe-masvical mucus futhi kungenziwa eceleni kwezinye izindlela zokuhlola i-ovulation.

    2. Ukuhlolwa kwegazi Ukuhlolwa kwegazi kungahlola amazinga we-hormone athinta ukuzala, kufaka phakathi i-hormone evuselelayo ye-follicle (Fsh), i-hormone (LH), i-estrogen, ne-progeten. Lezi zivivinyo zingasiza ekuboneni ukuthi ngabe i-ovulation yenzeka njalo futhi ingachaza noma yikuphi ukungalingani kwe-hormonal okungenzeka ukuthi kuthinte inzalo.
    Ukuhlolwa okukodwa okuvamile kwegazi lokuzala ngukuhlolwa kosuku lwe-3 Fsh. Lokhu kubandakanya ukulinganisa amazinga e-FSH ngosuku lwesithathu lomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Amazinga aphezulu we-FSH angakhombisa ukuncishiswa kwe-ovarian Reserve kanye nethuba elincishisiwe lokukhulelwa.

    3. I-TransVaginal ultrasound I-transvaginal ultrasound isivivinyo sokucabanga esisebenzisa amagagasi omsindo wemvamisa ephezulu ukudala izithombe zama-ovari kanye nesibeletho. Lokhu kuhlola kungasiza ukubona ukungahambi kahle kwesakhiwo okungenzeka ukuthinta inzalo, njengama-cysts noma ama-fibroids. Ingalinganisa futhi ubukhulu bokufakwa ngaphakathi kwe-endometrial kanye nenombolo yama-follicle akhona kuma-ovari, anganikeza imininingwane nge-ovaries.

    4. I-Hysterosalpoography (HSG) I-Hysterosalpoography (HSG) isivivinyo sokuxilonga esisebenzisa ama-X-ray.

heading: Yiliphi izinga lokuzala elijwayelekile?
body:
yini isilinganiso esijwayelekile sokuzala? - Ukuqonda izibalo zokuzala Amanani okuzala ayinkomba ebalulekile yokukhula kwesibalo sabantu kanye nezimo zabantu. Izinga lokuzala lichazwa njengenani elijwayelekile lezingane ezizalwa kowesifazane ngempilo yakhe yonke. Kulesi sihloko, sizoxoxa ngezinga elijwayelekile lokuzala, kufaka phakathi izici ezithinta ukuzala, amazinga okuzala emhlabeni jikelele, nokuthi amanani aguqukayo ashintshile kanjani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

izinto ezithinta inzalo Kunezici eziningana zingathintela amazinga wokuzala, kufaka phakathi:
    I-
  • Age: Ukuzala kwehla ngobudala, futhi abesifazane bavundile kakhulu kuma-20s abo nasekuqaleni kwama-30s.
  • Ezempilo: Izimo ezithile zezokwelapha, ezinjenge-polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) ne-endometriosis, zingathinta inzalo.
  • Izici zendlela yokuphila: Ukubhema, ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kotshwala ngokweqile, futhi konke kungathinta kakhulu ukuzala.
  • Izici zezemvelo: Ukuchayeka kubuthi, imisebe, namakhemikhali athile kungathinta ukuzala. I-
  • Ukufinyelela ku-Healthcare: Abesifazane abakwazi ukufinyelela ekwelashweni kwe-fearlity kanye nokunakekelwa kwezokwelapha kungenzeka bakhulelwe.

    Amanani ajwayelekile wokuzala Izinga elijwayelekile lokuzala lokuzala liyahlukahluka emhlabeni wonke futhi lithonywa yizinto ezinjengamasiko, inkolo kanye nesimo sezomnotho nezomnotho. Ngokuvamile, izinga lokuzala elizungeze i-2.1 libhekwa njengezinga lokuvuselela izinga lokuvuselela. Lokhu kusho ukuthi, ngokwesilinganiso, owesifazane ngamunye enezingane ezanele ukuze azishintshele esikhundleni sakhe kanye nomlingani wakhe kubantu.
    Emazweni athuthukile, izinga lokuzala livame ukwehlisa, ngamanani asukela ku-1.3 kuye ku-1.9. Lokhu kuvame ukubangelwa yizici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi ukufinyelela okwengeziwe kwezemfundo kanye nokunakekelwa kwezempilo, ukuvela kwabesifazane abasebenza emsebenzini, kanye nokuguqula isimo sengqondo ngakusayizi womndeni.
    Emazweni asathuthuka, amanani wokuzala avame ukuba ngaphezulu, ngamanani asukela ku-2.1 kuye ku-7.6. Lokhu kuvame ngenxa yezici ezinjengokuntuleka kokutholakala kwezemfundo kanye nokunakekelwa kwezempilo, emshadweni wokuqala, kanye nezimo zengqondo zamasiko zibheke ngosayizi womndeni.

    Amanani wokuzala azungeze umhlaba Amanani okuzala ayahlukahluka emhlabeni wonke, namanye amazwe anamanani aphansi kakhulu kanti amanye anamanani aphezulu kakhulu. Ngokwemininingwane evela e-United Nations, isilinganiso sokuzala esimaphakathi emhlabeni wonke njengamanje sizungeze 2.4. Kodwa-ke, lokhu kuyehluka kakhulu ngesifunda:
    • Afrika: 4.4
    • Asia: 2.2
    • Europe: 1.6
    • Latin America neCaribbean: 2.0
    • Oceania: 2.4

heading: Yiziphi izimbangela zokuzala kwabesifazane?
body:
izimbangela zokuzala kwabesifazane - Ukuqonda inzalo engabantukazi besifazane Ukungazizali kuchazwa njengokungakwazi ukukhulelwa ngemuva konyaka wokuya ocansini okungavikelekile. Kulinganiselwa ukuthi cishe cishe ama-10-15% emibhangqwana athintwa ukungazali. Kulesi sihloko, sizoxoxa ngezimbangela zokuzala kwabesifazane, kufaka phakathi izimo zezokwelapha, izinto zendlela yokuphila, kanye nezici zezemvelo ezingathinta ukuzala.

Izimo zezokwelapha ezingadala ukungazali kwabesifazane Izimo eziningana zezokwelapha zingathinta ukuzala kwabesifazane, kufaka phakathi:
  • Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS): I-PCOS yisifo sama-hormonal esingadala imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini esingangejwayelekile futhi ivikele i-ovulation.
  • endometriosis: I-Endometriosis yisimo lapho izicubu ezithambisa isibeletho zikhula ngaphandle kwesibeletho, ezingaholela ekuhlolweni nasekuvinjelweni okungavimba ukuvuthwa.
  • Uterine Fibroids: Ama-Uterine Fibroids akhulayo angezona agculisayo esibelethweni esingaphazamisa ukufakwa futhi abangele ukuphuphuma kwesisu.
  • Izinkinga ze-thyroid: Izinkinga ze-thyroid zingathinta i-ovulation futhi zikhuphule ubungozi bokuphuphuma kwesisu.
  • I-tubis blockages: Amabhulokhi kumashubhu e-Fallopian angavimba isidoda ukuthi afinyelele eqanda noma avikele iqanda elivundisiwe ekufinyeleleni isibeletho.

    Izici zendlela yokuphila ezingathinta ukuzala kwabesifazane Izici eziningi zokuphila zingathinta ukuzala kwabesifazane, kufaka phakathi:
    • Ukubhema: Ukubhema kunganciphisa ukuzala futhi kwandise ubungozi bokuphuphuma kwesisu.
    • Ukuphuza utshwala: Ukuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kunganciphisa ukuzala futhi kwandise ubungozi bokuphuphuma kwesisu.
    • isisindo: Ukuba ngokweqile noma ukukhuluphala ngokweqile kungathinta amazinga we-hormone kanye nokuphazamisa ama-ovulation.
    • Ukuxineka: Amazinga aphezulu okucindezela angaphazamisa i-ovulation futhi andise ubungozi bokuzala.
    • Ukuzivocavoca: Ukuzivocavoca ngokweqile kungaphazamisa amazinga we-hormone futhi kuthinte i-ovulation.
    • Ukudla: Ukudla okungekuhle nokudla okunempilo kungathinta inzalo.

      Izici zezemvelo ezingathinta ukuzala kwabesifazane Izici eziningana zezemvelo zingathinta ukuzala kwabesifazane, kufaka phakathi:
      • ubuthi: ukuvezwa ubuthi obuthile, njengezibulala-zinambuzane, ukuhola, kanye ne-mercury, kungathinta inzalo.
      • Imisebe: Ukuchayeka kwemisebe kungathinta ukuzala.
      • Amakhemikhali: Ukuchayeka kumakhemikhali athile, njengaleyo etholakala ekuhlanzeni imikhiqizo nemikhiqizo yokunakekelwa komuntu, kungathinta inzalo.
      • ukushisa: Ukuchayeka kumazinga okushisa aphezulu, njengaku-saunas noma amashubhu ashisayo, kungathinta ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda nokunciphisa ukuzala.

heading: Ingabe ukucindezela kungathinta ukuzala?
body:
ingacindezela ithinta ukuzala? - Ukuqonda ukuxhumana phakathi kwengcindezi nokungazali Ukungakwazi ukuzala kuyinkinga eyinkimbinkimbi engabangelwa uhla lwezinto, kufaka phakathi izimo zezokwelapha, izici zendlela yokuphila, kanye nezici zezemvelo. Kodwa-ke, abantu abaningi abazi ukuthi ukucindezelwa nakho kungaba nomthelela omkhulu ekuvuthweni. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuxhumana phakathi kwengcindezi nokuzala, kufaka phakathi imiphumela yengcindezi emazingeni e-hormone, i-ovulation, nokukhulelwa.

Ingcindezi ithinta kanjani inzalo? Ukucindezela kuyindlela yokuphendula yemvelo ezimweni eziyinselele, kepha lapho amazinga okuxineka eba engapheli noma aqine, angaba nemiphumela emibi emzimbeni. Lapho umzimba ungaphansi kwengcindezi, ukhipha i-hormone ebizwa ngokuthi i-cortisol, engaphazamisa ukukhiqizwa kwamanye ama-hormone aqakathekayo ukuze inzalo, njenge-estrogen ne-progesterone. Lokhu kuphazamiseka emazingeni e-hormone kungathinta i-ovulation futhi kwenze kube nzima ukukhulelwa.
Ngaphezu kokuthinta amazinga e-hormone, ukucindezela kungadala futhi nezinguquko emzimbeni ezingathinta ukuzala. Isibonelo, ukucindezela kungadala ama-spasms kumashubhu e-Fallopian, angaphazamisa ukunyakaza kweqanda nesidoda. Ukucindezela kungathinta futhi amasosha omzimba, okwenza kube nzima ngokwengeziwe ukuthi umzimba uxhase ukukhulelwa.

Imiphumela yengcindezi ku-ovulation Ukucindezela kungaba nomthelela omkhulu ku-ovulation, okwenza kube nzima ukukhulelwa. Isifundo esisodwa sathola ukuthi abesifazane abanamazinga aphezulu engcindezi bekungama-29% amathuba okuba akhulelwe uma kuqhathaniswa nabesifazane abanamazinga aphansi okucindezela. Ukuxineka okungamahlalakhona kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal emzimbeni, okuholela emijikelezweni yokuya esikhathini engajwayelekile noma yokungena ngaphansi kokutholwa (ukuntuleka kwe-ovulation). Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukucindezela kungadala ushintsho ku-mucus yesibeletho, okungenza kube nzima ngokwengeziwe isidoda ukuze sifinyelele iqanda.

Imiphumela yengcindezi ekukhulelweni Ukucindezelwa kungathinta nemiphumela yokukhulelwa, okwandisa ubungozi bokuphuphuma kwesisu nokuzalwa kwangaphambi kokuzalwa. Lapho umzimba ungaphansi kwengcindezi, ukhiqiza amazinga aphezulu e-cortisol, engadala ukuvuvukala kanye nomonakalo kwi-sitene lining. Lokhu kungenza kube nzima ngokwengeziwe ngeqanda elivundisiwe ukuze lifake futhi likhulise ubungozi bokuphuphuma kwesisu. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukucindezelwa kungadala ukuthi isibeletho sikhokhele, okuholela ekusebenzeni kwabathengi kanye nokulethwa.
I-

Ukulawula ukucindezelwa ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukuzala Ukulawula ukucindezela kungaba yindlela ephumelelayo yokwenza ngcono ukuzala futhi wandise amathuba okukhulelwa. Nawa amanye amathiphu wokulawula ukucindezela:
  • Amasu wokuphumula, njengokuphefumula okujulile, ukuzindla, noma i-yoga.
  • Vivinya umzimba njalo ukunciphisa ukucindezela futhi uthuthukise impilo yonke.
  • Thola ukulala ngokwanele ukusiza umzimba ubhekane nengcindezi.
  • Yidla ukudla okunempilo, okulinganiselayo ukusekela impilo yonke futhi kuncishiswe ukuvuvukala.
  • Xhuma nenethiwekhi yokusekela, efana nabangane, umndeni, noma umeluleki, ukusiza ukuphatha ukucindezela nokukhathazeka.

heading: Ingabe ukudla kungathinta ukuzala?
body:
ingadla ukudla kuthinta inzalo? - Ukuqonda ukuxhumana phakathi kokudla okunempilo nokuzala Uma kukhulunywa ngokuzala, abantu abaningi bagxila ekungeneleleni kwezokwelapha kanye nezinto zokuphila ezifana nokuzivocavoca nokuphathwa kwengcindezi. Kodwa-ke, isici esisodwa esivame ukunganakwa kokuzala ukudla. Esikudlayo kungaba nomthelela omkhulu empilweni yethu yokuzala, okuthinta amazinga e-hormone, i-ovulation, kanye nemiphumela yokukhulelwa. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuxhumana phakathi kokudla nokuzala, okubandakanya imiphumela yokudla okunempilo yokuzala kanye namathiphu wokwenza kahle ukudla kwakho ngempilo yokuzala.

Ukudla kuthinta kanjani inzalo? Ukudla kungathinta inzalo ngezindlela eziningi, kufaka phakathi:
  • Ukulawula amazinga we-hormone: izakhamzimba ezithile zibalulekile ekukhiqizeni ama-hormone alawule umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kanye ne-ovulation, njenge-estrogen, progesten, kanye nokwehlisa i-hormone (lh). Ngaphandle kokudla okwanele, amazinga e-hormone angaba mubala, okwenza kube nzima ukukhulelwa.
  • Ukusekela i-ovulation enempilo: I-ovulation iyinqubo eyinkimbinkimbi edinga izakhamzimba ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi amavithamini e-B, Vitamin e, i-iron, ne-zinc. Ngaphandle kwalezi zezakhi, i-ovulation ingaphazamiseka noma ingekho emthethweni.
  • Ukuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yeqanda: Ikhwalithi yamaqanda owesimame angathonywa ngokudla kwakhe. Ukudla okucebile okunothile njengezithelo nemifino kungasiza ukuvikela amaqanda kumonakalo, ngenkathi amafutha e-trans kanye nokudla okusetshenzwe kungaba nomphumela ophambene.
  • Ukusekela ukukhulelwa okunempilo: Ukudla okunempilo kungasiza ukunciphisa ubungozi bezinkinga ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa, njengesifo sikashukela sokukhulelwa, i-pre-eclampsia, kanye nomsebenzi wangaphambilini.

    Yikuphi izakhi ezibalulekile zokuzala? Kunezakhamzimba eziningi ezibaluleke kakhulu zokuzala:
      I-
    • uple: fate, eyaziwa nangokuthi njenge-folic acid, ibalulekile ekuthuthukisweni kwe-fetus enempilo futhi ingasiza ekunciphiseni ubungozi bokuzala kweziphene zokuzalwa. Abesifazane abazama ukukhulelwa bavame ukwelulekwa ukuthi bathathe isengezo se-folic acid, kepha kubalulekile futhi ukuba bathole icala emithonjeni yokudla enjengemifino eluhlaza enamahlamvu, ubhontshisi, kanye namabele abizayo. I-
    • Iron: I-Iron ibalulekile ekuvumeni okunempilo kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwe-placenta enempilo ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa. Imithombo emihle ye-iron ifaka inyama ebomvu, ubhontshisi, le-lentils, kanye nezinhlamvu ezivinjelwe.
    • zinc: I-zinc ibalulekile ekwenziweni kwama-hormone alawule i-ovulation, futhi futhi kubalulekile ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda emadodeni. Imithombo emihle ye-zinc ifaka ama-oysters, inyama yenkomo, inkukhu, kanye nezinhlamvu ezivinjelwe.
    • Ama-acid ama-omega-ama-omega-ama-acidi angu-Omega-3 abalulekile empilweni yonke futhi angasiza ukuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yeqanda. Imithombo emihle ye-Omega-3s ihlanganisa izinhlanzi ezinamafutha njenge-salmon, ama-walnuts, kanye ne-flaxseed.

heading: Ingabe indlela yokuphila ingathinta ukuzala?
body:
I-

Indlela yokuphila engabathinta kanjani inzalo - Ukuqonda umthelela wemikhuba ngempilo yokuzala Uma kukhulunywa ngokuzala, izinto eziningi zingathinta impilo yokuzala, kufaka phakathi izimo zezokwelapha, ubudala, kanye nozakhi zofuzo. Kodwa-ke, imikhuba yendlela yokuphila ingadlala nendima ebalulekile ekuvumeni. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuxhumana phakathi kwezindlela zokuphila nokuzala, okubandakanya imiphumela yokudla, ukuzivocavoca, ukubhema, utshwala kanye nengcindezi empilweni yokuzala.

Indlela yokuphila indlela yokuphila ithinta kanjani inzalo Imikhuba yendlela yokuphila ingaba nomthelela ekuzalweni ngezindlela eziningi, kufaka phakathi:
  • Ukulawula amazinga we-hormone: Ezinye izindlela zokuphila, njengokudla nokuzivocavoca, kungathinta amazinga we-hormone alawule umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kanye ne-ovulation. Ukungalingani kwe-hormonal kungenza kube nzima ukukhulelwa kabusha.
  • Ukusekela i-ovulation enempilo: ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, ukudla okunempilo, nokulala okwanele kungasekela i-ovulation ejwayelekile nenempilo. Ngaphandle kwale mikhuba, i-ovulation ingaphazamiseka noma ingekho emthethweni.
  • Ukwenza ngcono iqanda nekhwalithi yesidoda: Imikhuba ethile yendlela yokuphila, njengokudla okunempilo nokuzivocavoca, kungathuthukisa ikhwalithi yamaqanda nesidoda, okwenza kube lula ukukhulelwa.
  • ukunciphisa ukucindezela: Ukucindezela okungamahlalakhona kungathinta ukuzala ngokuphazamisa amazinga we-hormone kanye ne-ovulation. Ukuphatha ukucindezela ngamasu okuphumula, ukuzivocavoca, neminye imikhuba kungathuthukisa impilo yokuzala.
  • ukunciphisa ukuvezwa kobuthi: ukuvezwa ubuthi obufana nentuthu kagwayi notshwala kungathinta ukuzala ngokulimaza amaqanda nesidoda.

body:

    Ukuzivocavoca nokuzala Ukuzivocavoca njalo kungasiza ukuthuthukisa ukuzala. Nawa amanye amathiphu wokufaka ukuzivocavoca esimisweni sakho:

Abesifazane ababandakanyeka ekuzivocavoca okuphezulu kakhulu bangathola imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini engajwayelekile noma ngisho nokuyeka ukwehla ngokuphelele.

heading: Ungakuthuthukisa kanjani inzalo ngemuva kweminyaka engu-35?
body:
Ungathuthukisa kanjani ukuzala ngemuva kweminyaka engu-35? Abesifazane abaningi balibazisa ukuzalwa kwengane ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukahlukene, njengokulandela umsebenzi noma ukuthola umlingani ofanele. Kodwa-ke, njengabesifazane ubudala, ukuqina kwabo kwehla, okwenza kube nzima ukukhulelwa. Ngokusho kwe-American Society for Regressinitive Medicine, ukuzala kowesifazane kuqala ukuncipha kumaphakathi nama-30s asheshe asheshe ngemuva kweminyaka engu-37. Kepha izindaba ezinhle zingukuthi, kunezinyathelo ezinhle abesifazane abangakuthatha ukuze bathuthukise amathuba abo okukhulelwa ngemuva kweminyaka engu-35. In Lo mbhalo, sizoxoxa ngamasu athile aphumelelayo wokwenza ngcono ukuzala ngemuva kweminyaka engu-35.

1. Gcina isisindo esinempilo Ukuba ngokweqile noma ukukhuluphala ngokweqile kungathinta ukuzala ngokuphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal emzimbeni. Abesifazane abanenkomba yesisindo somzimba (BMI) abangaphansi kuka-18,5 noma ngaphezulu kuka-25 kungenzeka ukuthi kube nobunzima bokuguga noma ukukhulelwa. Ngakho-ke, ukulondolozwa kwesisindo esinempilo kubalulekile ukwenza ngcono ukuzala. Ukudla okulinganiselayo okunokudla okuhlukahlukene kokudla okuminyene nokuzivocavoca njalo kungasiza ukufeza isisindo esinempilo.

2. Yekani ukubhema futhi ukhawulele ukungena kotshwala Ukubhema nokuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kunganciphisa ukuzala futhi kwandise ubungozi bokuphuphuma kwesisu. Ukubhema kungalimaza izitho zokuzala, ukunciphisa ikhwalithi yeqanda nenani, futhi kuthinte amazinga we-hormone. Utshwala bungaphazamisa umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi bandise ubungozi bokuphazamiseka kwezakhiwo. Ngakho-ke, ukuyeka ukubhema nokuncipha kokudla kotshwala kungathuthukisa ukuzala ngemuva kweminyaka engu-35.

3. Phatha ukucindezela Ukucindezela kungathinta ukuzala ngokuphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal emzimbeni. Izinga eliphakeme lokucindezelwa lingaphazamisa i-ovulation futhi linciphise amathuba okukhulelwa. Ngakho-ke, ukuphatha ukucindezela kubalulekile ukwenza ngcono ukuzala. Amasu anjengokuvivinya umzimba, ukuzindla, i-yoga, nokwelulekwa kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela nokwenza ngcono ukuzala.

4. Cabanga nge-acupuncture I-Acupuncture ingukwelashwa okuhlukile okubandakanya ukufakwa kwezinaliti ezincanyana ezindaweni ezithile emzimbeni. Ezinye izifundo zibonisa ukuthi i-acupuncture ingathuthukisa ukuzala ngokwandisa ukugeleza kwegazi ezithweni zokuzala, ukulawula ama-hormone, nokunciphisa ukucindezela. Ngakho-ke, uma ucubungula i-acupuncture njengengxenye yohlelo lokwelashwa inzalo lungaba usizo kwabesifazane abangaphezu kuka-35.

5. Sebenzisa ukubikezela kwe-ovulation Kits Kusetshenziswa amakhithi wokubikezela we-ovulation ukubikezela kungasiza abesifazane ukuba babone iwindi elivundile nesikhathi sokuhlangana ngokufanele. Lawa makhithi athola ukuhlinzwa ku-hormone (LH), edala i-ovulation. Abesifazane abangaphezu kwama-35 bangahle babe newindows evundile evundile ngenxa yezinguquko ezihlobene nobudala kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ngakho-ke, ukusebenzisa amakhithi wokubikezela we-ovulation kungathuthukisa amathuba okukhulelwa ngemuva kweminyaka engu-35.

6. Funa usizo lwezokwelashwa Uma ngabe uzama ukukhulelwa izinyanga ezingaphezu kweziyisithupha ngaphandle kwempumelelo, kungaba yisikhathi sokufuna usizo lwezokwelashwa. Ukuhlolwa kokuzala kungasiza ukukhomba noma yiziphi izimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi okungenzeka ukuthi zithinta ukuzala. Ukwelashwa okufana nezidakamizwa zokuzala, ukufakwa kwe-intrauterine (IUI), noma ukukhiqizwa kwe-vitro kuphela (IVF) kungasiza ukuthuthukisa amathuba okukhulelwa ngemuva kweminyaka yobudala engama-35.

7. Cabanga nge-egg rearing I-Egg CareZing inqubo yokulondolozwa kwenzalo ehilela ukuqandisa amaqanda wowesifazane ukuze usetshenziswe esikhathini esizayo. Abesifazane abangaphezu kweminyaka engama-35 abangakakulungeli ukukhulelwa kepha bafuna ukugcina ukuzala kwabo kungabheka ukuqanda kwamaqanda. Amathuba okuphumelela ngokuncipha kwamaqanda ukwehla kobudala.

heading: Ungakuthuthukisa kanjani inzalo ngokubala isidoda esiphansi?
body:
Ungathuthukisa kanjani ukuzala ngokubala kwesidoda esiphansi Ukubala kwesidoda okuphansi kungenye yezimbangela ezivame kakhulu zokuzala kwabesilisa. Kungabangelwa yizici eziningi kufaka phakathi izakhi zofuzo, izici zendlela yokuphila, kanye nezimo ezithile zokwelashwa. Kodwa-ke, kunezinyathelo eziningana amadoda angathatha ukuthuthukisa ukubalwa kwawo kwesidoda futhi andise amathuba abo okukhulelwa ingane. Nazi ezinye izindlela zokwenza ngcono ukuzala ngokubala kwesidoda okuphansi:

1. Gcina isisindo esinempilo Ukukhuluphala ngokweqile noma ngokweqile kungathinta kabi ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda. Amadoda kufanele ahlose ukulondolozela isisindo esinempilo ngokudla ukudla okulinganiselayo nokuzivocavoca njalo. Lokhu kungasiza ukuthuthukisa impilo yokuzala yonke futhi kwandise ukubalwa kwesidoda.

2. Yekani ukubhema futhi ukhawulele ukungena kotshwala Ukubhema nokuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kungaba nomthelela omubi ekubaleni kwesidoda nekhwalithi. Amadoda kufanele ayeke ukubhema futhi anciphise ukuncishiswa kotshwala ukuze andise amathuba abo okukhulelwa.

3. Phatha amazinga okucindezela Ukucindezela kungaphazamisa amazinga we-hormone kanye nokukhiqizwa kwesidoda. Ukwenza ngcono ukuzala ngokubala kwesidoda okuphansi, amadoda kufanele athathe izinyathelo zokuphatha amazinga abo okuxineka. Lokhu kungafaka amasu wokuphumula anjengokuphefumula okujulile, i-yoga, noma ukuzindla.

4. Thuthukisa Ukudla kanye Nokudla Okunempilo Ukudla okunempilo okucebile kwezakhi ezinjenge-Vitamin C, zinc, kanye ne-folic acid kungathuthukisa ukubalwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi. Amadoda kufanele adle izithelo nemifino eningi, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni ancikile, namafutha anempilo ukuthuthukisa impilo yawo yokuzala.

5. Gwema Ukuchayeka Kubuthi Ukuchayeka kubuthi bemvelo njenge-pesticides, ukuhola, namanye amakhemikhali kungaba nomthelela omubi ekubaleni kwesidoda kanye nekhwalithi. Amadoda kufanele agweme ukuvezwa kwalezi zibuthi ngokugqoka amagiya okuvikela nokuthatha ezinye izinyathelo zokuphepha ezidingekayo.

6. Cabanga ukuthatha izithasiselo Izithako ezithile ezinjenge-zinc, vithamini C, ne-folic acid zingathuthukisa ukubalwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi. Amadoda kufanele akhulume nodokotela wawo mayelana nokuthi izithako ezingase zizuze kanjani ekuthuthukiseni impilo yazo yokuzala.

7. Phatha izimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi kwe- Izimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi kwezifo ezinjengokutheleleka, ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, nokungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile konke konke kungathinta ukubalwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi. Amadoda kufanele afune ukwelashwa kwalezi zimo ukuthuthukisa impilo yawo yokuzala futhi andise amathuba abo okukhulelwa.

8. Bheka ubuchwepheshe bokusiza bokuzala Ubuchwepheshe bokuzala obufana nokumanyolo we-vitro (IVF) kanye ne-intractytoplasmic isidoda umjovo (ICSI) kungasiza abesilisa ukuba abanesibali esiphansi bakhulelwa ingane. Lezi zinqubo zifaka ukufaka iqanda ngaphandle komzimba bese usifaka esibelethweni sowesifazane. Amadoda kufanele akhulume nodokotela wawo ngokuthi ngabe lezi zinqubo zingaba inketho yini kubo.
Ukwenza ngcono ukuzala ngokubala kwesidoda okuphansi kungenzeka ngendlela efanele. Abesilisa kufanele bathathe izinyathelo zokuthuthukisa impilo yabo yonke kanye nenhlala-kahle yokwandisa amathuba abo okukhulelwa ingane.

heading: Ungakuthuthukisa kanjani inzalo ngezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni?
body:

Abesifazane abahlangabezana nezikhathi ezinzima kufanele babonisane nomhlinzeki wabo wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuthola imbangela yokwelashwa okufanele. Ukuqonda okuthathwa njengesikhathi esindayo nokuthi ukufuna ukholo kungasiza abesifazane ukuthi baphathe le ndaba evamile.

heading: Ngingasenza kanjani isikhathi sami sifike ngokushesha?
body:
Ukwenza kanjani isikhathi sakho size ngokushesha Ukuya esikhathini kuyinqubo yemvelo eyenzeka emzimbeni wesifazane, kepha kwesinye isikhathi ungafuna ukwenza isikhathi sakho sifike ngokushesha. Kunezindlela eziningana zokwenza lokhu, zombili zemvelo nezokwelashwa. Kulesi sihloko, sizoxoxa ngezindlela zokwenza isikhathi sakho sifike ngokushesha.

1. Ukuzivocavoca Ukuzivocavoca njalo kungasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi wenze isikhathi sakho sifike ngokushesha. Ukuzivocavoca kwandisa ukugeleza kwegazi endaweni ye-pelvic, okungasiza ukuletha ukuya esikhathini. Zama ukwenza ukuzivocavoca kwe-aerobic, njengokugijima, ukuhamba ngebhayisikile, noma ukubhukuda, okungenani imizuzu engama-30 ngosuku.

2. Sebenzisa ukwelashwa kokushisa Ukufaka isicelo sokushisa esiswini sakho esingezansi kungasiza ukukhulisa ukuhamba kwegazi endaweni ye-pelvic futhi kukhuthaze isikhathi sakho ukuthi size ngokushesha. Zama ukusebenzisa ibhodlela lamanzi ashisayo noma i-heating pad esiswini sakho esingezansi imizuzu engu-15 ukuya kwe-15 ngasikhathi, amahlandla ambalwa ngosuku.

3. Thatha amakhambi okuya esikhathini okubhalisayo Kunamakhambi amaningana angasiza ekunxeleni kokuya esikhathini, kufaka phakathi i-ginger, i-parsley kanye ne-turmeric. Ungadla la makhambi ngesimo setiye noma ama-caplule. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuxhumana nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ngaphambi kokusebenzisa noma yimaphi amakhambi okuya esikhathini.

4. Zama i-acupressure I-Acupressure inqubo yendabuko yamaShayina ye-Chinese ehilela ukusebenzisa ingcindezi yamaphoyinti athile emzimbeni. Kunamaphoyinti ambalwa ashukumisayo okukholelwa ukuthi avuselelwa esikhathini, kufaka phakathi emuva okuphansi nangaphakathi kwe-ankle. Ungazama ukusebenzisa i-Acupressure Mat noma Ukubonisana ne-Acupunctunist enelayisense ukuthola isiqondiso.

5. Cabanga ukulawula kokuzalwa Amaphilisi okulwa nokuzalwa angasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi enze isikhathi sakho sifike ngokushesha. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi amaphilisi okulawula ukuzala angaba nemiphumela emibi futhi alungele wonke umuntu.

7. Yehlisa ukucindezela Ukucindezela kungaphazamisa umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi ukubambezeleka isikhathi sakho. Zama izindlela zokuzilibazisa, ezinjenge-yoga, ukuzindla, noma ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, ukunciphisa ukucindezela nokukhuthaza ukuya esikhathini.

heading: Ngingayibambezela kanjani isikhathi sami?
body:
Ungayibambezela kanjani isikhathi sakho Kunezikhathi lapho ukuba nesikhathi sakho kungaphazamisi noma kungakhululeki, futhi ungahle ufune ukubambezela. Kunezindlela eziningana zokwenza lokhu, zombili zemvelo nezokwelashwa. Kulesi sihloko, sizoxoxa ngezindlela zokubambezela inkathi yakho.

1. Amaphilisi okulawula ukuzala Amaphilisi okulawula ukuzala angasetshenziselwa ukubambezela isikhathi sakho. Ungeqa amaphilisi we-placebo kwiphakethe lakho bese uqala iphakethe elisha lamaphilisi asebenzayo ngokushesha. Lokhu kuzovimbela isikhathi sakho ukuthi siye kwisheduli yayo ejwayelekile. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ngaphambi kokuqala noma ukuvimba noma iyiphi indlela yokulawula ukuzala.

2. Hormonal iud Idivaysi ye-Hormonal intrauterine (iDED) ingasetshenziselwa ukubambezela isikhathi sakho. Idivayisi ikhipha ama-hormone avimbela i-ovulation futhi angamisa isikhathi sakho ekuza. Kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ukubona ukuthi i-IUD ilungile yini kuwe futhi ifakwe kahle.

3. Izidakamizwa ze-Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory (NSAIDS) Ama-NSAIDS, njenge-ibuprofen, angasetshenziselwa ukubambezela isikhathi sakho. Ukuthatha ama-NSAIDS ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokuba isikhathi sakho kufanele sinciphise inani lama-prostaglandins emzimbeni wakho, angabambezela ukuqala kokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ngaphambi kokuthatha noma yimuphi umuthi omusha.

4. Vitamin C Imithamo ephezulu yevithamini C ingasetshenziselwa ukubambezela isikhathi sakho. Ukuthatha ama-milligram angama-500-1,500 ama-milligrams we-Vitamin C ngosuku izinsuku ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokuba isikhathi sakho kufanele sinciphise amazinga we-progesterone emzimbeni wakho futhi ambezele isikhathi sakho. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ngaphambi kokuthatha noma yiziphi izithasiselo ezintsha.

5. Amakhambi amakhambi Amanye amakhambi angasetshenziswa ukubambezela inkathi yakho, kufaka phakathi i-parsley, ginger, kanye ne-chamomile. La makhambi angadliwa ngendlela yetiye noma ama-caplule. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ngaphambi kokuthatha noma yimaphi amakhambi amasha noma izithasiselo.

6. Ukuncishiswa kwengcindezi Ukucindezela kungathinta umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi ukubambezeleka isikhathi sakho. Ukuzijwayeza izindlela zokuphumula, ezinjenge-yoga, ukuzindla, noma ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezeleka nokubambezela isikhathi sakho. heading: Ngingazikhulula Kanjani Izimpawu ze-PMS?
body:
Ungakudambisa kanjani izimpawu ze-PMS Isifo sangaphambi kokuya esikhathini (i-PMS) iqembu lezimpawu abesifazane abaningi abahlangabezana nazo ngaphambi kwesikhathi sabo sokuya esikhathini. Lezi zimpawu zingahluka kusuka kokumnene kuya kunzima futhi zingafaka ukuqhakaza, ukuqhekeka, ukuguquka kwemizwelo, nokukhathala. Kulesi sihloko, sizoxoxa ngezindlela zokunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS.

1. Ukuzivocavoca Ukuzivocavoca njalo kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS. Ukuzivocavoca umzimba kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela, ukuthuthukisa imizwa, futhi kunciphise ukuqhakaza. Inhloso okungenani imizuzu engama-30 yokuzivocavoca okulinganiselwe okuphakathi, njengokuhamba nge-brisk, ukugijima, noma ukuhamba ngamabhayisekili, izinsuku eziningi zeviki.

2. Ukudla Ukudla ukudla okunempilo nokunempilo kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS. Ukudla okuphezulu ku-fiber, njengezithelo, imifino kanye okusanhlamvu, kungasiza ukunciphisa ukuqhakaza nokuqunjelwa. Ukudla okuphezulu nge-calcium, njengobisi, ushizi, ne-yogurt, kungasiza ukunciphisa ama-cramps nokushintshwa kwemizwelo. Kubalulekile futhi ukunciphisakela ukuphuza kwakho i-caffeine, ushukela nosawoti, okungakhulisa izimpawu ze-PMS.

3. Amasu wokuphumula Ukuzijwayeza amasu okuphumula, njenge-yoga, ukuzindla, noma ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezeleka nokwenza ngcono imizwa. Lawa masu nawo angasiza ekunciphiseni ukungezwani kwemisipha kanye nokuqhekeka.

4. Ukwelashwa kwe-Heat Therapy Ukufaka ukushisa esiswini noma emuva emuva kungasiza ukunciphisa ama-cramps kanye nokungezwani kwemisipha. Ungasebenzisa i-Heating Pad, ibhodlela lamanzi ashisayo, noma ugeze ngokufudumele.

5. Imithi engaphezulu kwe-counter Imithi engaphezulu kwe-counter, efana ne-ibuprofen noma i-naproxen, ingasiza ukunciphisa ama-cramps futhi kunciphise izinhlungu. I-acetaminophen nayo ingasetshenziselwa impumuzo yezinhlungu, kepha ayinayo izakhiwo zokulwa nokuvuvukala njenge-ibuprofen ne-naproxen. Kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuthatha noma yimuphi umuthi omusha, ikakhulukazi uma unezimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi noma uthatha eminye imishanguzo.

6. Izithasiselo Izithasiselo, njenge-Magnesium noma i-Vitamin B6, zingasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS. I-Magnesium ingasiza ukunciphisa ama-cramps, kanti uVitamin B6 angasiza ukuthuthukisa imizwa. Kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ngaphambi kokuthatha noma yiziphi izithasiselo ezintsha, njengoba ezinye izithasiselo zingasebenzisana nemithi noma zibe nemiphumela emibi.

7. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal, njengamaphilisi okulawula ukuzalwa, kungasiza ukulalela imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini futhi kunciphise izimpawu ze-PMS. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ngaphambi kokuqala noma ukuvimba noma iyiphi indlela yokulawula ukuzala, ngoba kungaba nemiphumela emibi futhi uhlanganyele neminye imithi.

lapho ukubona udokotela Uma ubhekene nezimpawu ezinzima ze-PMS eziphazamisa impilo yakho yansuku zonke, kubalulekile ukubona umhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Bangasiza ekuboneni noma yiziphi izimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi ezingathinta umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi zinikeze ukwelashwa okufanele.

Isiphetho Izimpawu ze-PMS zingangakhululeki futhi ziphazamise impilo yansuku zonke, kepha kunezindlela eziningi zokuzikhulula. Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, ukudla okunempilo, amasu wokuphumula, ukwelashwa okushisa, umuthi owedlule, izithasiselo, kanye nokulawulwa kokuzalwa kwe-hormonal konke kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS.

I-PMS ingaqala noma kuphi ukusuka emavikini angama-1-2 ngaphambi kwesikhathi futhi ingahlala kuze kube yilapho isikhathi siqala noma ngisho nangesikhathi. Kulesi sihloko, sizoxoxa ngezimpawu ezivamile ze-PMS.

izimpawu zomzimba Izimpawu zomzimba ze-PM zingahlukahluka kusuka kowesifazane kuya kowesifazane, futhi kungafaka:
  • esiswini sokuqhakaza esiswini
  • Ubumnene bebele noma ukuvuvukala
  • cramps
  • ikhanda lekhanda
  • isicanucanu
  • ukuqunjelwa noma isifo sohudo
  • ukukhathala
  • Ubuhlungu obuhlangene noma bemisipha
  • isisindo sokuzuza
  • acne flare-ups

    Izimpawu ezingokomzwelo Izimpawu ezingokomzwelo ze-PM zingahluka futhi ziyehluka ngowesifazane kuya kowesifazane, futhi zingafaka:
    • ukungacasuki
    • ukukhathazeka
    • ukushintshwa kwemizwelo
    • Ukudana
    • yehlile inzalo emisebenzini
    • inkathazo egxile ku-

      ubukhulu bezimpawu Ubulukhuni bezimpawu ze-PMS bungahlukahluka kuye ngowesifazane kuya kowesifazane. Abanye besifazane bangathola kuphela izimpawu ezithambile, kanti abanye bangathola izimpawu ezinzima eziphazamisa impilo yabo yansuku zonke. Ubunzima bezimpawu bungahluka kusuka kumjikelezo ukujikeleza, futhi bungathonywa yizinto ezifana nengcindezi, ukudla, nokuzivocavoca.

      PMDD Kwabanye besifazane, izimpawu ze-PMS zingakhula ngokwanele ukuba ziphazamise impilo yazo yansuku zonke. Kulezi zimo, umhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwezempilo angabathola nge-dysphoric disorder (PMDD). I-PMDD iyindlela enzima kakhudlwana ye-PMS futhi ingafaka izimpawu ezifana nokudangala okukhulu, ukushintshwa kwemizwelo ngokweqile, nemicabango yokuzibulala. Uma ubhekene nezimpawu ezinzima ze-PMS, kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

      Isiphetho I-PMS yisimo esivamile abesifazane abaningi ababhekana nakho ngaphambi kwesikhathi sabo sokuya esikhathini. Izimpawu ze-PM zingahlukahluka kowesifazane kuya kowesifazane, futhi zifaka izimpawu zomzimba ezifana nokuqhakaza kanye nokuqhekeka, kanye nezimpawu ezingokomzwelo ezifana nokucasulwa nokucindezelwa. Uma ubhekene nezimpawu ezinzima ze-PMS, kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuthola ukuthi ngabe kunesimo sezokwelapha esingaphansi kanye nokuxoxa ngezinketho zokwelashwa.

heading: Ngingakwazi kanjani ukuphatha isikhathi isikhathi?
body:
Ungayiphatha Kanjani Isikhathi Sokuqina Kwesikhathi Isikhathi se-CRAMPS, esaziwa nangokuthi i-DysMenorrhea, ingaba uphawu olujwayelekile futhi olungathandeki lokuya esikhathini kwabesifazane abaningi. Kulesi sihloko, sizoxoxa ngezindlela zokuphatha izindlela zokugcina futhi sinciphise ukungaphatheki kahle ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

1. Sebenzisa ukwelashwa kokushisa Ukufaka ukushisa esiswini esingezansi kungasiza ukuphumula izicubu futhi kudambise ukucindezela. Ungasebenzisa i-Heating Pad, ibhodlela lamanzi ashisayo, noma ugeze ngokufudumele ukuhlinzeka impumuzo. Amanye amaphakethe okushisa aze afike aze aze aze anezilungiselelo eziguqukayo, ngakho-ke ungakhetha izinga lokushisa elintofontofo kuwe.

2. I-Over-the-Counter Pain Expeeters Abathengisi bezinhlungu ezingaphezu kwe-counter anjenge-ibuprofen noma i-naproxen bangasebenza ngempumelelo ekunciphiseni ukumiswa kokuya esikhathini. Le mishanguzo isebenza ngokunciphisa ukuvuvukala kanye nokuvimba amasiginali wezinhlungu. Kubalulekile ukulandela imiyalo kwilebula futhi ukhulume nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma kukhona okukhathazayo ngokuthatha le mithi.

3. Ukuzivocavoca Ukuzivocavoca kungasiza ukukhulula ama-endorphin, okungokwemvelo ama-painkiller, futhi kungathuthukisa ukugeleza kwegazi, okunganciphisa ukuminyanisa. Ukuzivocavoca okukhanyayo okunjenge-yoga, ukuhamba, noma ukwelula kungasiza ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi ungaziphoqeki kanzima uma ubhekene nokungaphatheki kahle.

4. Izinguquko zokudla Ezinye izinguquko zokudla zingasiza ukunciphisa ukunciphisa isikhathi. Ukudla ukudla okulinganiselayo okubandakanya izithelo eziningi, imifino kanye nezinhlamvu eziphelele kungasiza ekunciphiseni ukuvuvukala emzimbeni. Kubalulekile futhi ukuthi uhlale u-hydrate ngokuphuza amanzi amaningi futhi ugweme iziphuzo ezinoshukela, i-caffeine, notshwala, obungandisa ukuminyaza.

5. Zama i-acupuncture I-Acupuncture iyindlela yendabuko yamaShayina yamaShayina ehilela ukufakwa kwezinaliti ezincanyana ezindaweni ezithile emzimbeni. I-acupuncture ingasiza ekunciphiseni izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini kanye nokuqhakaza ngokukhulula ama-endorphin kanye nokwenza ngcono ukugeleza kwegazi. Kubalulekile ukuthola i-acupunctunist enelayisense futhi enolwazi uma ukhetha ukuzama le ndlela.

6. Amasu wokuphumula Ukuxineka kungandisa amasu okuya esikhathini, ngakho-ke amasu wokuphumula anjengokuzindla, ukuphefumula okujulile, noma ukubhucungwa umzimba kungasiza ekunciphiseni ukungaphatheki kahle. Ukuzinika isikhathi semisebenzi yokuzinakekela njengokufunda, ukuthatha ukugeza, noma ukulalela umculo wokuthulisa kungasiza nasekunciphiseni ukucindezeleka nokwenza ngcono inhlala-kahle.

7. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kwe-hormonal okufana nephilisi, isichibi, noma indandatho kungasiza ukulawula ama-hormone futhi kunciphise ubukhulu bokuma kokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukukhuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngezinzuzo ezingaba khona kanye nobungozi bokulawulwa kokuzalwa kwama-hormonal futhi uthole indlela esebenza kangcono ngezidingo zakho.

Isiphetho Isikhathi sokuqhekeka singangakhululeki, kepha kunezindlela ezahlukahlukene ezingasetshenziswa ukuphatha izinhlungu futhi zinciphise ukungaphatheki kahle. Ukwelashwa okushisa, ukunciphisa izinhlungu ngaphezulu kwe-counter, izinguquko, izinguquko zokudla, i-acupuncture, amasu wokuphumula, kanye nokulawulwa kokuzalwa kwama-hormonal kuyizindlela ezingaba khona zokuphatha isikhathi sokuphatha isikhathi sokuphatha. Kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi uthole izindlela ezisebenzela wena. Uma unokuqina okunzima kokuya esikhathini okuphazamisa impilo yakho yansuku zonke.

heading: Ingabe ukuzivocavoca kungathinta isikhathi sami?
body:
ingavivinya umzimba ithinte isikhathi sakho? Ukuzivocavoca kuyingxenye ebalulekile yendlela yokuphila enempilo, kepha kungathinta umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini? Impendulo inguyebo, ukuzivocavoca kungaba nomthelela esikhathini sakho. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuthi ukuvivinya umzimba kungathinta kanjani umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini nokuthi yini ongayenza ukuze ulondoloze ukulinganisela okunempilo.

Ukuzivocavoca kungathinta kanjani isikhathi sakho Ukuzivocavoca kungathinta umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini ngezindlela eziningi. Ukuzivocavoca okukhulu kungadala ukucindezela emzimbeni, okungaholela ekushintsheni kwamazinga e-hormone kanye nemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Abesifazane ababandakanyeka ekuzivocavoca okukhulu bangathola isikhathi esingajwayelekile, izikhathi zeqa, noma i-amenorrhea (ukungabikho kwesikhathi sokuya esikhathini okungenani izinyanga ezi-3).
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ukuzivocavoca okulinganiselayo kungaba nomthelela omuhle kumjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Ukuzivocavoca umzimba kungasiza ekulawuleni ama-hormone futhi kuthuthukise impilo yonke, okungaholela kumjikelezo ojwayelekile wokuya esikhathini. Abesifazane abahlanganyela ekuzivocavoca ngokulinganiselayo bangathola izikhathi ezibuhlungu kakhulu kanye nezimpawu ezimbalwa zokwedlula zonke.

Ungaligcina kanjani ibhalansi enempilo Isihluthulelo sokugcina ibhalansi enempilo phakathi kokuzivocavoca nokujikeleza kwakho kokuya esikhathini ukulalela umzimba wakho. Uma ubhekene nezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni noma ezinye izinguquko zokuya esikhathini, kungaba uphawu lokuthi ucindezela umzimba wakho kanzima. Kubalulekile ukuthola ibhalansi phakathi kokuzivocavoca nokuphumula okusebenzela izidingo zakho ngazinye.
Nawa amanye amathiphu wokukusiza ugcine ukulinganisela okunempilo:

1. Qala kancane Uma umusha ukuzivocavoca, kubalulekile ukuqala kancane futhi kancane kancane ukukhulisa ubukhulu nobude besikhathi sokusebenza kwakho. Lokhu kuzonikeza isikhathi sakho somzimba ukuze uguqule futhi unciphise ubungozi bokushintsha kokuya esikhathini.

2. Naka umzimba wakho Lalela umzimba wakho futhi unake noma yiluphi ushintsho kumjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Uma uhlangabezana nezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni noma ezinye izinguquko zokuya esikhathini, kungaba uphawu lokuthi udinga ukulungisa inqubo yakho yokuzivocavoca.

3. Thatha izinsuku zokuphumula Izinsuku zokuphumula zibaluleke njengezinsuku zokuvivinya umzimba. Ukuthatha izinsuku zokuphumula kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela emzimbeni futhi kuvumele isikhathi sakho somzimba ukuba silulame. Inhloso okungenani izinsuku ezimbili noma ezimbili zokuphumula ngeviki.

4. Yidla ukudla okulinganiselayo Ukudla ukudla okulinganiselayo okubandakanya izithelo eziningi, imifino kanye nezinhlamvu zonke kungasiza ukusekela impilo yonke futhi kulawule ama-hormone. Kubalulekile futhi ukuthi uhlale u-hydrate ngokuphuza amanzi amaningi.

5. Khuluma nodokotela wakho Uma ubhekene nokushintsha komjikelezo kokuya esikhathini noma ukhathazekile ngokuthi ukuvivinya umzimba kungathinta kanjani isikhathi sakho, khuluma nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Bangasiza ekuboneni noma yiziphi izingqinamba eziyisisekelo futhi banikeze umhlahlandlela wokuthi ungayigcina kanjani ibhalansi enempilo.

Isiphetho Ukuzivocavoca kungaba nomthelela kumjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, kepha kungenzeka ukuthi ulondoloze ibhalansi enempilo. Ukuqala kancane, ukunaka umzimba wakho, ukuthatha izinsuku zokuphumula, ukudla ukudla okunempilo, futhi ukukhuluma nodokotela wakho konke kungasiza ukusekela umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini enempilo. Khumbula ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi uthole inqubo yokuzivocavoca esebenza ngezidingo zakho ngazinye.

heading: Ingabe ukudla kungathinta isikhathi sami?
body:
Ingabe ukudla kwakho kungathinta isikhathi sakho? Abesifazane abaningi bathola izinguquko emjikelezweni wabo wokuya esikhathini ngezikhathi ezihlukile empilweni yabo. Ngenkathi izinguquko ze-hormonal, ingcindezi, kanye nezimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi zonke zingathinta isikhathi sakho, ukudla kungadlala indima. Ukuxhumeka phakathi kokudla nokuya esikhathini Ucwaningo lubonisa ukuthi ukudla kungaba nomthelela kumjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Ezinye izinto zokudla ezingathinta isikhathi sakho zifaka:

1. Ukushoda kwezakhi zomzimba Ukushoda kwezakhi zomzimba, njenge-Iron noma i-Vitamin B12 Ukushoda, kungathinta ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone alawule umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Lokhu kungasho lutho kungaholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni noma ukopha okunzima.

2. Ukudla okuphansi kwe-caloric Uma ungaqedi amakhalori anele, umzimba wakho ungangena esimweni sokubulawa yindlala, okungathinta ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone futhi kuholele ekushintsheni kokuya esikhathini.

4. Ukudla okunamafutha amaningi Ukudla ukudla okuphezulu kumafutha agcwele noma adlulisiwe kungaholela ekuvuvukeni futhi kuthinte ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone alawule umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini.

okufanele udle umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini okunempilo Ukugqugquzela umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini enempilo, kubalulekile ukuthi udle ukudla okulinganiselayo okuhlanganisa izinhlobo ezahlukene zokudla okunothile. Nazi ezinye izinguquko zokudla ongazenza ukusekela umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ezinempilo:

2. Kudla ukudla okucebile kwe-iron I-Iron iyizakhi ezibalulekile zokukhiqizwa kwama-hormone alawule umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Ukudla ukudla okunothile okunensimbi enjengemifino enamaqabunga, ubhontshisi, amantongomane nembewu ukusekela umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini enempilo.

3. Faka amafutha anempilo Ukudla amafutha anempilo afana nama-Omega-3 Ama-Acid asiza ukunciphisa ukuvuvukala kanye nokuxhasa ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone. Faka nokudla okufana nezinhlanzi ezinamafutha, amantongomane nembewu ekudleni kwakho.

4. Khawulela ushukela kanye nokudla okusetshenzwe Ukunciphisa umkhawulo wokudla kwakho ushukela kanye nokudla okusetshenzwe kungasiza ukunciphisa ukuvuvukala kanye nokuxhasa ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone. Esikhundleni salokho, gxila kukho konke, ukudla okunothile okunothile.

Isiphetho Ukudla kungaba nomthelela kumjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Ukudla ukudla okulinganiselayo okubandakanya ukudla okunempilo okunothile, kudla ukudla okunothile kwensimbi, kufaka phakathi amafutha anempilo, okukhawulela ushukela, ukunciphisa ushukela nokudla okulungiselelwe konke, nokuhlala ama-hydrate kungasiza ukusekela umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini enempilo. Khumbula ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi wenze izinguquko zokudla ezisebenzela izidingo zakho ngazinye.

heading: Ngabe ukucindezela kuthinta isikhathi sami?
body:
ingacindezela ithinta isikhathi sakho? Ukucindezela kuyinto evamile ezimpilweni zethu zansuku zonke, futhi ngenkathi kungaba nomthelela omkhulu empilweni yethu yomzimba nakwezengqondo, kungathinta nomjikelezo wethu wokuya esikhathini. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuxhumana phakathi kwengcindezi nesikhathi sakho nokuthi ungaphatha kanjani ingcindezi ukukhuthaza umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini onempilo.

heading: Ngingakusebenzisa kanjani ukopha okunamandla ngesikhathi sami?
body:
Ukuphatha ukopha okusindayo ngesikhathi sakho Ukopha kakhulu ngesikhathi sakho, esaziwa nangokuthi amaMenorrhagia, kungaba yinkinga ekhungathekisayo futhi ephikisanayo. Ngenkathi kungokwemvelo ukuba nokopha isikhathi esithile ngesikhathi sakho, ukopha ngokweqile kungaba uphawu lwesimo esingaphansi noma nje kuphela ngenxa yokushintshashintsha kwezimo zomzimba wakho. Nawa amanye amathiphu wokuphatha ukopha okusindayo ngesikhathi sakho:

1. Khuluma nodokotela wakho Uma ubhekene nokopha kakhulu ngesikhathi sakho, isinyathelo sokuqala ukukhuluma nodokotela wakho. Udokotela wakho angenza ukuhlolwa ukuze alawule noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi ezingase zibangele inkinga. Kwezinye izimo, ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, ama-fibroids a-uterine, noma ezinye izimo kungaba ukusolwa. Udokotela wakho angakuncoma nokwelashwa okungasiza ukunciphisa ukopha kwakho, njengokulawulwa kokuzalwa kwama-hormonal, izidakamizwa zokulwa nokuvuvukala (ama-NSOIDS), noma eminye imishanguzo.

2. Sebenzisa inkomishi yenkomishi yokuya esikhathini Inkomishi yokuya esikhathini iyindebe encane, esebenza kabusha efaka esithweni sangasese sakho ukuqoqa uketshezi lokuya esikhathini. Ngokungafani nama-tampon, adonsa uketshezi lokuya esikhathini, izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zimane ziqoqe. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ungashiya inkomishi yokuya esikhathini kuze kube amahora afinyelela kwayi-12 ngasikhathi, esingasiza uma ubhekene nokopha kakhulu. Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini futhi zinobungane futhi zisebenza kakhulu kunokulahlwa kwemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini.

3. Cabanga ukuguqula indlela odla ngayo Ukudla kwakho kungadlala indima emjikelezweni wakho wokuya esikhathini. Ukudla ukudla okunempilo nokunempilo okunothile ngensimbi kungasiza ukunciphisa ukopha okunamandla. I-iron ibalulekile ekwenziweni kwamangqamuzana abomvu egazi, aphethe umoya-mpilo ezicubu zomzimba wakho. Uma ungatholi i-iron eyanele ekudleni kwakho, umzimba wakho ungahle ube nenkinga yokukhiqiza amaseli abomvu egazi abomvu, angaholela ekopha kakhulu. body:

Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuthi imishanguzo ethile ingathinta kanjani inzalo futhi ihlinzeke ngemininingwane ngezinye izindlela noma ukucatshangelwa.

imishanguzo kanye nokuzala kwabesifazane Imithi eminingana ingathinta ukuzala kwabesifazane ngezindlela ezihlukile. Nazi ezinye izibonelo:

1. Izidakamizwa ze-Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory (NSAIDS) Ama-NSAIDS asetshenziswa kaningi, njenge-ibuprofen kanye naproxen, ngokuvamile aphephile uma kuthathwa ngezikhathi ezithile nakumithamo enconyiwe. Kodwa-ke, ukusetshenziswa kwe-NSAID-yesikhathi eside noma okuphezulu kwama-NSAID kungaphazamisa i-ovulation nokubambezeleka noma ukuvimbela ukukhishwa kwamaqanda kusuka kuma-ovari.

2. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal Izindlela zokuvimbela inzalo ze-Hormonal, kufaka phakathi amaphilisi okulawulwa kokuzalwa, iziqeshana, imijovo, namadivayisi we-hitauterine e-intrauteruteri (iDS), anzelwe ukuvimbela ukukhulelwa. Ngenkathi lezi zindlela zisebenza kakhulu ekuphathweni kokuzalwa, zicindezela okwesikhashana ukufundwa ngokuguqula amazinga we-hormone kanye nokuvimbela i-ovulation. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi inzalo imvamisa ibuyisa ngemuva kokuyeka ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kwama-hormonal, kepha isikhathi singahluka kumuntu ngamunye.

3. I-AntiDEPRESSATATInts Imithi ye-antidepressured ivame ukubekelwa ukumelana nokudana komoya kanye nezinye izimo zempilo yengqondo. Ngenkathi ama-antidespersdant amaningi ngokuvamile abhekwa njengephephile, ezinye izifundo ziphakamisa ukuthi ama-antideidention athile, anjenge-Serotonin Requatke inhibitors (SSRIS), angathinta ukuzala ngokuphazamisa umthetho we-hormonal kanye nemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, kudingeka ucwaningo olwengeziwe ukuze kusungulwe ukuxhumana okucacile phakathi kokusetshenziswa kwe-antideressures kanye nezinkinga zokuzala.

4. I-Chemotherapy nemisebe Izidakamizwa ze-Chemotherapy kanye nokwelashwa kwemisebe, evame ukusetshenziswa ukwelapha umdlavuza, kungaba nomthelela omkhulu ekuvundisweni kwabesifazane. Lezi zindlela zokwelapha zingalimaza noma zichithe amaqanda, okuholela ekuzandleni kokuzala kwesikhashana noma kwaphakade. Uma ubhekene nokwelashwa komdlavuza futhi ufisa ukugcina ukuzala, kubalulekile ukuxoxa ngezinketho zokulolwa kwezokulondolozwa komhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuqala ukwelashwa.

5. ImmunosuppressAnts Imithi ye-Immunosuppressuprespressionant enqunywe ukuphatha izifo ze-autoimmune, njenge-lupus, i-rheumatoid arthritis, noma ukwenqatshwa okulula. Abanye ama-immunosuppurcespression bangaba nemiphumela emibi ekuvumeni ngokuphazamisa ngokulawulwa kweHormonal noma abangela ukungahambi kahle kokuya esikhathini. Uma unezinto ezikhathazayo ngomthelela we-immunosuppressants ekuvuzayo kwakho, thintana nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuholwa.

heading: Kuyini ukungazali okungachazwanga?
body:

Ngenkathi amanye amacala okuzala angabiwa ngenxa yezimbangela ezithile, kunezimo lapho imbangela ihlala zingaziwa, kuholele ekuhlolweni kokuzala okungafakwanga. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola umqondo wokungazalisi okungachazeki, izimbangela zawo, inqubo yokuxilonga, nezinketho zokwelashwa ezikhona.

  • ecashile ama-hormonal ukungalingani: Ukuhluka okuncane emazingeni e-hormone angatholakali ngokuhlolwa okujwayelekile kungathinta ukuzala futhi kuphazamise ulwazi.
  • Ikhwalithi yeqanda: Ngenkathi ukuhlolwa okujwayelekile kungakhombisa umsebenzi ojwayelekile we-ovari, ikhwalithi yeqanda isengadlala indima ekungeneni okungafakwanga. Izinkinga ezinokuvuthwa kwamaqanda noma ukungahambi kahle okungabonakali ngokuhlolwa okujwayelekile kungathinta umanyolo.
  • Umsebenzi wesidoda: Naphezu kwemiphumela evamile yokuhlaziywa kwemiphumela, izinkinga ezicashile kumsebenzi wesidoda noma ikhwalithi kungaba nomthelela ekungeneni okungafakwanga. I-
  • Ubunzima bokufakelwa Lokhu kungenzeka ngenxa yezinkinga ezingabonakali nge-sitene lining noma izici zokuvikelwa komzimba.
  • Ukuqina kwezakhi zofuzo: Ukuzala okungachazwanga, kwezinye izimo, zihlotshaniswe nezinto zofuzo ezingaqondakali ngokuphelele noma zikhonjwa kalula.
  • Izinto eziqinile nezindlela zokuphila Lokhu kungafaka ukuvezwa ubuthi, ukucindezelwa, noma imikhuba ethile yokudla kanye nokuzivocavoca. I-

    Inqubo yokuxilonga Ukuxilonga ukungazivezi okungachazwanga kubandakanya ukuhlolwa okuphelele kwabo bobabili abalingani. Inqubo yokuxilonga ingafaka:
    • Umlando wezokwelapha kanye nokuhlolwa ngokomzimba: Umlando wezokwelapha onemininingwane kanye nezivivinyo zomzimba zenziwa ukukhomba noma yiziphi izinto ezingaphansi ezingaba nomthelela.
    • Ukuhlola izinga le-Hormone: Ukuhlolwa kwegazi kwenziwa ukuhlola amazinga we-hormone kuwo wonke umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, uhlola noma yikuphi ukungahambi kahle. I-
    • Ukuhlolwa kokulondolozwa kwama-ovari: Ukuhlolwa okufana ne-antral follicle count (AFC) kanye namazinga we-anti-Müllerian ama-hormone (AMH) angaqhutshwa ukuze ahlole inani nekhwalithi yamaqanda. I-
    • Ukuhlaziywa kwesisulu: Ukuhlaziywa kwamasu okuphelele kwenziwa ukuhlola ikhwalithi nenani lesidoda.
    • hysterosalpiopography (HSG): Le nqubo ifaka ukujova udayi okuhlukile kumashubhu e-Uterus nase-Fallopian ukubheka noma yimaphi amabhulokhethi noma ama-abnormalities.

heading: Ngingasisebenzisa Kanjani Izimpawu ze-PMS?
body:
Ukuphatha Izimpawu ze-PMS I-Preminstruld syndrome (PMS) ibhekisela kwinhlanganisela yezimpawu ezingokomzimba, ezingokomzwelo, zokuziphatha ezenzeka ezinsukwini noma amasonto aholela esikhathini sokuya esikhathini. Ngenkathi i-PM ingahluka ngobunzima nobude phakathi kwabantu, kunamasu ambalwa nezinguquko zendlela yokuphila ezingasiza ukuphatha futhi kudambise izimpawu ze-PMS. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola izindlela ezisebenzayo zokubhekana nezimpawu ze-PMS futhi sithuthukise inhlala-kahle ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

Izinguquko zendlela yokuphila yokuphathwa kwe-PMS Ukwamukela indlela yokuphila enempilo futhi wenza izinguquko ezithile ngendlela yakho yansuku zonke kungaba nomthelela omuhle ekuphatheni izimpawu ze-PMS. Cabanga ngamasu alandelayo:
  • Ukuzivocavoca okujwayelekile: Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni ngokomzimba okujwayelekile kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS ngokunciphisa ukucindezelwa, ukuthuthukisa imizwa nokuthuthukisa inhlala-kahle. Inhloso okungenani imizuzu engama-30 yokuzivocavoca okulinganiselayo ezinsukwini eziningi zeviki. I-
  • Ukudla okunempilo: Ukudla okulinganiselayo okugcwele izithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okugcwele kanye namaprotheni aphansi kungasiza ukulawula izimpawu ze-PMS. Yehlisa ukudla kwakho kokudla okusetshenzwe, i-caffeine, notshwala, obungandisa izimpawu. I-
  • Ukuphathwa kwengcindezi: Ukuxineka kungabizi izimpawu ze-PMS, ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukuthola izindlela ezisebenzayo zokuphatha ukucindezela. Prakthiza amasu okuphumula anjengokuphefumula okujulile, ukuzindla, i-yoga, noma ukwenza izinto zokuzilibazisa nemisebenzi ekulethela injabulo. I-
  • Ukulala okwanele: Ukulala ngokwanele kokulala kubalulekile ekuphatheni izimpawu ze-PMS. Sungula isheduli yokulala ejwayelekile, dala inqubo yokuphumula yokulala, bese udala indawo yokulala ethandekayo ukuqinisekisa ukulala kwekhwalithi. I-
  • Ukuxhaswa okungeziwe: Izithako ezithile, njenge-calcium, i-magnesium, ama-vitamium acid, angasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS. Xhumana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuqala noma yiziphi izithasiselo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi ziphephile futhi zikulungele.

    Ukuphatha izimpawu zomzimba Izimpawu zomzimba ezihambisana ne-PMS zingahlukahluka kakhulu, kepha kukhona amasu ongawasebenzisa ukuphatha nokunciphisa umthelela wawo:
      I-
    • Ubuhlungu bokuya esikhathini: Faka ukushisa esiswini esingezansi, thatha amasu okukhohlisa aphikisayo njenge-ibuprofen noma i-naproxen, bese uzama amasu wokuphumula, bese uzama amasu wokuphumula, bese uzama amasu wokuphumula. I-
    • isisa sebele: Gqoka i-bra esekelayo, faka i-compress efudumele, futhi uvikele i-caffeine kanye nokudla okunosawoti, okungakhulisa ukungaphatheki kahle kwebele.
    • Ukuqhakaza nokugcinwa kwamanzi: Yehlisa ukuphuza kwakho kwe-sodium, phuza amanzi amaningi, udla ama-banana acebile e-potassium, anjenge ama-bhenana anamaqabunga, ukusiza ukunciphisa ukuqhakaza kanye nokugcinwa kwamanzi.
    • heath> heath>

heading: Yini inzalo futhi yiziphi izimbangela?
body:
I-

Ukuqonda Ukungazali kanye Nezimbangela Zayo Ukungazalisi kuyisimo esiyinkimbinkimbi esithinta abantu abaningi nemibhangqwana emhlabeni wonke. Kuchazwa njengokungakwazi ukukhulelwa ingane naphezu kokuya ocansini okwenziwa ngokocansi okungenani unyaka owodwa. Ukuzala kungaba ngumphumela wezinto ezahlukahlukene, zombili kwabesilisa nabesifazane, ezithinta ukusebenza okujwayelekile kohlelo lokuzala. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola umqondo wokuzala inzalo, izimbangela zawo ezingaba khona, kanye nezici ezingaba nomthelela ebunzimeni bokuthola ukukhulelwa.
I-

echaza i-infertility Ukuzala kungahlukaniswa ngezinhlobo ezimbili: inzalo yokuqala kanye nokuzala kwesibili. Ukuzala okuyisisekelo kubhekisa ukungakwazi ukukhulelwa ingane yize kungakhulelwa kwangaphambilini. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ukuzala kwesibili, ngakolunye uhlangothi, kwenzeka lapho imibhangqwana eyake yakhulelwa ngokwemvelo ibe nobunzima bokuthi iphinde yakhulelwa.

izimbangela ezingaba khona zokuzala inzalo Ukungazali kungavela ekuhlanganiseni kwezinto ezithinta abesilisa nabesifazane. Kubalulekile ukukhomba nokuqonda lezi zimbangela ukuthola inkambo yokwelashwa efanelekile. Nazi izimbangela ezijwayelekile zokuzala:
    I-
  • ukuphazamiseka kwe-ovulation: okungahambisani noma okungahambisani nakho kungaba nomthelela ekungeneleni ukuzala. Izimo ezinjenge-polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, ukuphazamiseka kwe-thyroid, kanye nemithi ethile kungaphazamisa inqubo ejwayelekile ye-ovulation. I-
  • Izici ze-tubal: ezivinjelwe noma ezilimele ze-fallopian amashubhu zingavimba isidoda ukuthi sifinyelele eqanda noma sivimbele uhambo lweqanda oluvundisiwe esibelethweni. Izimbangela zezinto ze-tubal zifaka isifo sokuvuvukala kwe-pelvic (PID), ukuhlinzwa kwangaphambilini, i-endometriosis, kanye nezifo ezithile ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI).
  • Izici zesibeletho noma zesibeletho I-Uterine Fibroids, ama-polyps, ama-mervical mucus, kanye ne-stenosis yesibeletho yizibonelo ezithile zezinto zesibeletho noma zesibeletho ezingaba nomthelela ekuletheni.
  • endometriosis:
  • Izici zesilisa> < Izimbangela zokungazalisi kwabesilisa zifaka i-VaricoCele (imithambo ekhulisiwe kuma-testicles), izimo zofuzo, umuthi, nezici zendlela yokuphila. I-
  • Izici eziqinile: Kwezinye izimo, ukuzala kungabangelwa ukungahambi kahle kofuzo okuthinta umsebenzi wokuzala. Lokhu kungahambi kahle kungaba khona kuMlingani ngamunye futhi kungafaka ama-chromosomal ukuhlukunyezwa noma ukuguqulwa okuthile kofuzo.

heading: Yiziphi izinketho zokwelashwa zokuzala?
body:
Izinketho zokwelashwa zokuzala inzalo Ukuzala kungaba yisimo esiyinselele futhi esinenkokhiso engokomzwelo sabantu kanye nemibhangqwana efisa ukuba nezingane. Kodwa-ke, ngentuthuko kwisayensi yezokwelapha, kunezindlela zokwelashwa eziningana ezitholakalayo ukusiza ukunqoba ukungazali nokukhulisa amathuba okuthola ukukhulelwa. Ukukhethwa kokwelashwa kuncike kwimbangela eyisisekelo yokuzala inzalo, isikhathi sokuzala inzalo, iminyaka, kanye nezinketho zabantu abathintekayo. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ezinye izinketho ezivamile zokwelashwa zokuzala.

1. Ukuguqulwa Kwendlela Yokuphila Kwezinye izimo, ukwenza ukuguqulwa kwendlela yokuphila kungathuthukisa ukuzala. Lokhu kuguqulwa kufaka:
  • Ukudla okunempilo: Ukuthola ukudla okulinganiselayo okubandakanya izithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni anempilo, namafutha anempilo angandisa impilo yokuzala. I-
  • Ukuzivocavoca okujwayelekile: Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni njalo ngokomzimba kungasiza ukugcina isisindo esinempilo, ukuthuthukisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal, nokwenza ngcono inhlala-kahle. I-
  • Ukubhema kanye nokubhema kotshwala: Ukuyeka ukubhema nokunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kotshwala kungathuthukisa imiphumela yokuzala kwabesilisa nabesifazane. I-
  • Ukuncishiswa kwengcindezi: Ukuphatha ukucindezela ngamasu wokuphumula, ukucabanga, ukwelulekwa, noma ukuhlanganyela emisebenzini ekunciphise ukucindezelwa kungaba nomthelela omuhle ekuvumeni.

    2. Imithi Ngokuya ngesizathu esingaphansi sokuzala, imishanguzo ehlukahlukene inganqunyelwa ukubhekana nezinkinga ezithile:
      I-
    • Ukungeniswa kwe-ovulation: Kwabesifazane abanenkinga ye-ovulation, imithi efana ne-clomiphhene cirtrate, i-letozole, noma i-gonadotropins inganqunyelwa ukukhuthaza i-ovulation.
    • I-Hormone Therapy: Ukwelashwa kwe-hormone kungasetshenziselwa ukwelapha ukungalingani kwe-hormonal kuwo womabili amadoda nabesifazane, kulawulwa umsebenzi wokuya esikhathini kanye nokwenza ngcono umsebenzi wokuzala. I-
    • I-antibiotic: Uma ukuzala kubangelwa ukutheleleka, ama-antibiotic angabekwa ekwelapheni ukutheleleka okuyisisekelo futhi athuthukise ukuzala. I-
    • I-Strong> Usizo Ubuchwepheshe bokuzala (ubuciko): Ubuciko bubandakanya amasu ahlukahlukene athuthukile okusiza ekukhulelweni, kufaka phakathi:
      • - Intrauterine Inmination (IUI): Isidoda siqoqiwe, sigezwe, bese sifakwa ngqo esibelethweni sowesifazane lapho kukhulisa amathuba okuvundiswa. I-
      • - ekuvuthweni kwe-vitro (IVF): IVF ifaka ukubuyiselwa kwamaqanda kuma-ovariya wowesifazane, nokudlulisela kabusha isidoda esibelethweni.
      • - ICSI: Indlela ye-intracytoplasPlasmic umjovo osetshenziswa ngokubambisana ne-IVF, lapho isidoda esisodwa sifakwe ngokuqondile eqanda ukwenza lula ukuvuthwa.
